sense.def:
Progress
je postopno napredovanje ali približevanje cilju ali koncu nečesa.

seg.quote: She is making good progress with her German.

sense.def:
The progress of an activity
je način, kako neka dejavnost poteka.

seg.quote: He followed the progress of hostilities with impatience.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
in progress
, se dogaja.

seg.quote: The battle was still in progress.

sense.def:
To progress
pomeni postati boljši ali preiti na višji položaj.

seg.quote: Technology did not progress any further for centuries.

sense.def:
To progress
pomeni tudi potekati dalje.

seg.quote: My impressions changed as the trip progressed.

sense.def:
To progress to something
pomeni začeti delati ali imeti nekaj, kar je novo, boljše ali sodobnejše.

seg.quote: From there we progressed to a discussion on politics.
